properties.areaDesc: Western Pima County Including Ajo/Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument
properties.headline: Freeze Watch issued February 2 at 3:00AM MST until February 4 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Tucson AZ
properties.description:
* WHAT...sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 possible both
mornings.

* WHERE...Western Pima County.

* WHEN...For the first Freeze Watch, from late Monday night
through Tuesday morning. For the second Freeze Watch, from late
Tuesday night through Wednesday morning.

* IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other
sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor
plumbing.
properties.instruction:
Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent
freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should
be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have
in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above-
ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

NWSheadline: FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING
